full_output.summary: With 8.5+ years of experience, I excel as a System Administrator with proficiency in macOS and Windows environments. My expertise encompasses implementation, configuration, security, maintenance, support, troubleshooting, and team management. I possess a strong ability to deliver top-notch solutions and work effectively in diverse areas of IT administration.

experiences.description: Provide Desktop Support based upon AHD Tickets and Incidents and advise the team concerned to follow it up till Closure. Manage User Credentials like Unlocking and Resetting Passwords in Active Directory and E- Man Management tool based upon requests. Ensure Local Connectivity is up and running 24/5. Acknowledge User Requests and Incidents based upon Ticketing tool and update the information in the relevant category upon closure and close the Tickets. Ensure that all raised AHD tickets are closed within SLA. Provide RCA for tickets in case of Violation in brief. Monitor the continuity of IT Services, Coordinate with other Teams like IT Asset Management Team and implement planned activities for Customer Satisfaction to meet all activities and tasks as defined by governing SLAs. Configuration of Papercut server and integration of the printers for entire location in the network.

Maintained desktops and laptops for smooth functioning. Configured desktops and laptops to meet specific requirements. Ensured LAN connectivity and resolved related issues. Installed various education-related software. Verified CCTV connectivity through Cloud-based system. Conducted regular backups of all systems via LAN. Performed on-site inspections at different branches to monitor systems. Provided remote assistance to troubleshoot application and OS issues.

skills: Safeguards information system assets by identifying and solving potential and actual security problems
Protects system by defining access privileges, control structures, and resources
Recognizes problems by identifying abnormalities, reporting violations
full_output.name: Mohammed Mohsin S
